title: IPH 85 - God is our strength and refuge

lines: God is our strength and refuge,
and we therefore will not fear,
God the Lord of hosts is with us evermore!
God is in the midst of her –
God the Lord of hosts is with us evermore!
Come, see the works of our maker,
wars will cease across the world
Be still and know your creator,
God the Lord of hosts is with us evermore!

CCLI: Richard Thomas Bewes, b. 1934 After Psalm 46 CCLI 128675
